page.title: 10TODHEAD LIGHTHOUSE, KINNEFF.
page.content: {Todhead lighthouse}was built by D.Stevenson and was opened on 20th September, 1897. The lighthouse is 12 metres in height above the rock but it is also 12 metres down into the rock. On a clear night the light can be seen at a distance of 29 miles. Recently the lighthouse became fully automatic. The light comes from a 3500 watt electric bulb. Big bulls_eye lenses moving round the light makes it flash 4 times in 15 seconds followed by an interval of 15 seconds without a flash. In the case of a power cut the lighthouse in run by a stand_by diesel generator. It also has an{electric fog {horn}which is very loud because I can hear it at my house which is in the centre of Kinneff two miles from the lighthouse. The horn sounds 4 blasts of 2.5 seconds every minute.
